description:
As someone who has spent the past ten years using my voice in my job, I know only too well how important it is to me.

Communication is vital, your voice is your livelihood, so taking care of it matters. This course is going to benefit you greatly if you;

1. Speak every day at work 

2. Often have to address large groups of people 

3. Often have to speak to potential new clients

If you speak everyday at work, wouldn’t it be great to learn how to use your voice safely and more effectively?

If you have to address large groups of people on a frequent basis, wouldn’t it be great to command their attention and know how to keep them interested in what you have to say?

If you often have to speak to potential new clients, wouldn’t it be great to gain their confidence from the offset and secure that new account?

We’ve all seen that confident, effective public speaker, haven’t we? The person who can step in front of a group of people and mesmerise them with their confidence and the way they project their voice?

Why can’t that be you?

How I can help you:

I will show you how to use your voice effectively and safely to command respect and win that sale. 

I will show you how to correct existing bad habits to turn losses into gains. 

I will show you how to become more confident as a speaker in order to improve your sales abilities.

About Gillian:

 I’m a professional voice user, experienced speaker, singer and vocal teacher.

I hold a Bachelor of Music degree (BMus) and during my university training, I specialised in vocal studies and vocal physiology.

A classically trained soprano, I have taught thousands of students, helping them to develop a safe and effective vocal technique.

My professional experience, which spans over 10 years within the UK and Europe, includes work- ing with various education authorities within numerous establishments, private 1-1 coaching with performers and professional voice users, and instructing non native English speakers in order to help them perfect pronunciation and diction.

I’ve taught thousands of people how to open up and use their voice more effectively.

In 5 steps to a better sales voice, you will learn how to use your voice more effectively, correct bad habits and increase your vocal confidence to improve your overall vocal abilities.
title: 8 Steps To A Better Sales Voice
